data.message: Going retro and old 🏫 school. Going pure. Going to mix, rap, rock, funk, folk, acoustic, emo into the Best Camp Shady 3.0. G. O. A. T yeah I said it... Any frickin takers that are Alive? Thought not! Sorry Pac but would have still only tied Marshall the white lol legend genius.

replies.message: You know I always got your back Marshall and you got mine Always. We boys and brothers of a much Higher purpose and calling. Much love and respect and friendship. But remember always keep true to YOU and stay always a little SHADY...baby..
anytime bro...512-579-7881, keep it close to your heart and soul. but this # is for only u, kim, Hailey
